title: Name was changed ?
body:
Hello 
I haven't played this game in a long time, however I reinstalled it and logged in today to find my name was changed ?
I'm about 99% sure my name was "ChromakeyDreamcoat" before this, but now my name looks like some kind of bot gibberish. 
Can I have my name back or some clarification on what happened ?

replies.body: Might have been ChromakeyDream, im not entirely sure. It was over a year ago+

As *Zombiemaster* mentioned, if you were inactive for a long time, your name would have been up for grabs and another player could have picked it up. This is part of our Summoner Name Cleanup initiative, which is gone over in [this article.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for the quick comment , sorry for the late reply! 
I read through your link and believe you are completely correct, my name was most likely changed in the SUMMONER NAME CLEANUP , however in the article it said I would receive a name change, and I never got that option, rather, my name was just turned to gibberish. Can I get some clarification? 
Again, thanks for the reply!!

When you first logged in after your period of inactivity, you should have been given the option to select a new summoner name. If this didn't happen, a weird bug may have occurred and in that case, we may be able to help if you reach out in a [support ticket.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)

Let me know if you have any further questions.
I opened a ticket and was able to get the problem resolved really quickly, thank you so much for the information and help !!!

Considering the account is level 10 and you haven't played on it in over a year, this is likely because someone took your summoner name.

When an account goes inactive, the summoner name is protected for a certain number of months, depending on the summoner level. Once that time has passed, the summoner name becomes available to anyone who wants it. 

If this happens, I believe you can ask Riot for a free summoner name change via a support ticket, but I'm not 100% sure.
